title: Fan Ni Gachikoi Suru Idol To, Idol Ni Shiotaiou Na Fan.
alternative_title: ファンにガチ恋するアイドルと、アイドルに塩対応なファン。 ; Fan ni Gachikoi Suru Aidoru to, Aidoru ni Shiotaiouna Fan. ; An Idol Who's Super in Love with Her Fan and a Fan Who's Cold to His Idol
status: ファンにガチ恋するアイドルと、アイドルに塩対応なファン。 ; Fan ni Gachikoi Suru Aidoru to, Aidoru ni Shiotaiouna Fan. ; An Idol Who's Super in Love with Her Fan and a Fan Who's Cold to His Idol
description:
Description :
        Ririka is an unpopular idol who is in love with a fan named Suzuki. She tries various ways to get his attention, but Suzuki's reactions are always cold. However, Ririka's love is so strong that she is determined to do whatever it takes to make him look her way.
